secret_rule: Only items that have been featured in a riddle from folklore or literature can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "apple" and "honey".
Yes, you can bring a pear.
Yes, you can bring a banana.
Yes, you can bring a peach.
Yes, you can bring a watermelon.
Player: Can I bring a hot dog?
No, you cannot bring a raspberry.
Player: Can I bring maple syrup?
Player: Can I bring a pineapple?
The rule for the game "Going on a Picnic" seems to be that you can only bring items that are sweet or used as sweeteners.
